problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=8,AC=5,过点A的直线DE∥CB,∠ABC与∠ACB的平分线分别交DE于E,D两点,则DE的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = N_0, AC = N_1, the straight line DE ∥ CB passing through point A, the bisector of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersects DE at two points E and D respectively, then the length of DE is ()
raw_comment: 此题考查等腰三角形的判定和性质,关键是根据角平分线的对应和平行线的性质得出AB=AE
